name: crescent
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(something with) a curved shape that has two narrow pointed ends, like the moon when it is less than half of a circle: The moon was a brightly shining crescent.
Catherine Falls Commercial/Moment/GettyImages
a row of houses or a road built in a curve: They live at 15 Park Crescent.
